mapper.select: SELECT a.public_yn_cd, a.content_no, a.mydiary_content, a.mydiary_create_dt, a.mydiary_mod_dt, b.content_nm, b.thumbnail FROM tb_my_diary a join tb_content b on a.content_no = b.content_no join tb_user c on a.user_no = c.user_no where c.user_no = #{user_no} order by a.mydiary_create_dt desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_my_diary a join tb_content b on a.content_no = b.content_no join tb_user c on a.user_no = c.user_no where c.user_no = #{user_no}
